name: Simple NSC Generator
explanation: Based on the file format defined at 'https://campaign-logger.com/generator/help', we will try out new ideas here to define an extended format for generator files. This 'explanation' property is one new extension which should contain details on the generator or a table (where it may occur, too).

tables.name: name
tables.explanation: This table just defines the general layout of a table object.

tables.name: location
tables.explanation: This table calls into a library file to generate its results.
